title: New Internship Cycle Starting Soon
body: The new internship cycle will begin on May 1st, 2025. Get ready to start applying!

title: New Internship Cycle Started
body: The internship cycle has begun! You can now start applying for internships.

title: Report Status Update
body: Your internship report has been accepted. Great job!

title: Report Status Update
body: Your internship report has been flagged. Click to view comments and appeal if needed.
comments: Please provide more details about your learning outcomes and project contributions.

title: Report Status Update
body: Your internship report has been rejected. Click to view comments and appeal if needed.
comments: The report lacks sufficient technical depth and project details.

title: Appointment Accepted
body: Your appointment for Career Guidance has been accepted for March 22, 2024 at 2:00 PM.

title: Incoming Call
body: You have an incoming call for Report Clarifications on March 23, 2024 at 3:00 PM.

title: Upcoming Workshop
body: Live Q&A with Alumni is starting soon on June 15, 2024 at 3:00 PM.
